long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome Tab Organizer
Efficiently manage and organize your browser tabs with a single click. Tab Organizer provides a suite of powerful tools to help you keep your browsing experience clean and productive.

Features:
Move Similar Tabs to New Windows: Automatically group and move tabs with the same domain into new windows for better organization.

Sort Tabs Alphabetically: Quickly sort all tabs in the current window alphabetically by their titles.

Merge All Windows: Combine all open browser windows into a single window, consolidating your workspace.

Tile Tabs Vertically: Place each tab in its own window and tile them as vertical columns, with a maximum of 8 columns, for a clear and organized view.
